item.description:
Come on out for The Cambridge Improv Incubator: Going for the Gold. While the Olympics are going on in Vancouver, we'll have our own Winter Games but without the snow (at least inside). We'll play a whole bunch of short form games much like the show Whose Line is it Anyway? Come have some fun with us.

Look for us in the small room to the left of the front door. A small $3 donation is recommended to help pay cost of room and website.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the room to the left of the front door as you walk into the building
item.name: Going for the Gold
